snippet.title: Official Portal Knights Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Leave the familiar world behind and step into the fantastic unknown with Portal Knights. Play with your friends in this action-packed crafting adventure across dozens of sandbox islands connected by ancient portals. Craft your adventure. Forge your hero. Become the ultimate Portal Knight!

Find out more - http://www.portalknights.com

Join the Community!
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/PortalKnights
Twitter - https://twitter.com/portalknights
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/portalknights/
Official Forums - http://www.portalknights.com/forums
